alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 7:40AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ISOLATED SNOW SHOWERS AND ICY ROADS TO IMPACT THE MORNING COMMUTE... Isolated showers this morning will once again allow snow to fall and accumulate on elevated and grassy surfaces. On roads it should generally remain more slushy. However, freezing air temperatures and some freezing road temperatures may allow black ice to form, especially on bridges and overpasses. Expect spotty snow accumulations of up to an additional half inch this morning. Temperatures should warm above freezing by mid-morning.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
